items.question: How do I book a ticket?
items.answer: Simply create an account, search for your route, select your preferred time, and complete the payment. You'll receive a QR code ticket instantly.

items.question: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
items.answer: Yes! You can cancel or modify your booking up to 2 hours before departure for a full refund. Changes made within 2 hours are subject to availability.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, mobile wallets (D17, Flouci), and cash payments at partner locations.

items.question: Is my ticket transferable?
items.answer: Tickets are non-transferable and can only be used by the person whose name is on the booking. Valid ID is required when boarding.

items.question: What if I miss my bus?
items.answer: If you miss your bus, you can rebook for the next available trip. Additional fees may apply depending on ticket type and availability.

items.question: Do you offer student or group discounts?
items.answer: Yes! We offer special discounts for students, seniors, and groups of 5 or more. Contact our support team for more details.
